tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper URL sanitation in the `sanitizeUrl` function (index.ts). This issue is of low severity, as the URL requires additional processing to be exploited.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@braintree/sanitize-url` library to the patch version.
